entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Native AOT - Microsoft.Data.SQLite crashing on SqliteConnection.Open() #31541
  • Model with multiple nested owned entities and properties of same types within a single entity throws InvalidOperationException #31540
  • Memory Issue with EF Core 7 DbContext ServiceProviderCache #31539
  • EF Core does not include boolean column with default value in SQL INSERT statement #31538
  • Linq Ef Core query doesn't include filter parameter for join table if not set in the same () parentheses #31536
  • When a parent and child entity has a one to many relationship and the child table is a temporal table, removing a child from its parent collection will trigger an unexpected error. #31535

Closed

  • What's the diff between `[Index(nameof(Email), IsUnique = true), Index(nameof(Title), IsUnique = true)]` and `[Index(nameof(Email), nameof(Title), IsUnique = true)]`? #31537

PullRequests

Merged

  • [release/8.0] Update SDK #31534
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #31542
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:

Updated

  • Microsoft.Data.Sqlite: Only try sqlite3_win32_set_directory on Windows and be more resilient #31532
  • 31355: SQLite: Add EF.Functions.Unhex #31454
  • Update SDK #31533
